comment._content: George Walbridge Perkins, "vice-president of New York Life Insurance Company"

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Looks to be in City Hall, New York, as in Probably during the Walsh Commission hearings in January 1915.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: George Perkins was at New York's City Hall for Walsh Commission testimony on January 21 and 22, 1915. His testimony is online at: www.archive.org/stream/industrialrelati08unitrich#page/76...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: bior, swanq, and artolog:  Thanks for providing us with more information on Perkins.  We'll include some of it next time we update.
